Html: I cant seem to find out if this new grid supports virtualizing...

If you take a look at DataGrid.cs in the static constructor you will see that the ItemsPanel is set to a DataGridRowsPresenter which derives from VirtualizingStackPanel.  Also, in 3.5 SP1VirtualizingStackPanel also supports item container recycling (learn more here, http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/2008/05/14/recycling-that-item-container.aspx).  In the final release column virtualization will also be supported.
